title: Authors and Citation
text: Garbuno (2023). distributions: Wrapper functions random variables. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {distributions: Wrapper functions for random variables},   author = {Alfredo Garbuno},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: Wrapper functions for random variables
text: can install development version distributions GitHub :

title: Wrapper functions for random variables
text: basic example shows define standard normal random variable. can use sample density methods either generate random numbers random variable evaluate density function. example, can generate collection 100 random points evaluate density function 1. ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples.
code: library(distributions) x <- GaussianRandomVariable$new() x #> <Gaussian> #>   Inherits from: <ContinuousRandomVariable> #>   Public: #>     density: function (x, log = TRUE)  #>     initialize: function (mean = 0, sd = 1)  #>     mean: 0 #>     sample: function (n = 1)  #>     samples: function (nsamples = 1, ...)  #>     sd: 1 class(x) #> [1] "Gaussian"                 "ContinuousRandomVariable" #> [3] "R6" x$sample(100) x$density(1)

title: GaussianRandomVariable object — GaussianRandomVariable
text: Defines Normal random variable. uses backend functions defines Gaussian random variable. definitions distributions R6 object. Tha parametrization used $$X \sim \mathsf{Normal}(\mu, \sigma)\,,$$ parameters \(\mu\) \(\sigma\) mean standard deviation, respectively.

title: GaussianRandomVariable object — GaussianRandomVariable
text: random variables distributions defined R6 objects. fields (referenced ) needed objects R6::R6Class. context defines specific instance random variable used. , public fields parameters random variable \(\theta \\mathbb{R}^p\), \(p\).

title: GaussianRandomVariable object — GaussianRandomVariable
text: mean (double)  center distribution, \(\mu\). sd (double)  dispersion around mean, \(\sigma \geq 0\).

title: GaussianRandomVariable object — GaussianRandomVariable
text: Generates Gaussian ContinuousRandomVariable object specified mean (mean) standard deviation (sd).

title: GaussianRandomVariable object — GaussianRandomVariable
text: mean center distribution. sd dispersion around center distribution.

title: GaussianRandomVariable object — GaussianRandomVariable
text: Generates random variables using stats::rnorm() function.

title: GaussianRandomVariable object — GaussianRandomVariable
text: nsamples (integer) number random numbers generated behaves like random variables.

title: GaussianRandomVariable object — GaussianRandomVariable
text: Evaluates density function using stats::pnorm() function.

title: GaussianRandomVariable object — GaussianRandomVariable
text: x (array) evaluate density function. log (Boolean) indicates evaluating log-density.
